document_data.name: Jhiri
document_data.mainbody: '''Prexijandilin Jhiri''' was a [[dragonborn]] warrior member of [[Clan Prexijandilin]], and a member of the [[Lance Defenders]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Description: Jhiri had crimson eyes and umber scales.
document_data.History: In 1479 DR, Jhiri was in charge of a detachment of Lance Defenders during the [[invasion of Tymanther]] by the [[ash giants]].
